Shoe-based navigation system: A shoe with GPS technology can help users navigate unfamiliar places by providing real-time directions and information.
Shoe-based language translator: A shoe with a microphone and a translation app can translate spoken words into another language.
Shoe-based fitness tracker: A shoe with sensors can monitor the wearer's foot movements and provide information about their fitness level, calories burned, and other health-related data.
Shoe-based air purifier: A shoe with a built-in air filter can help purify the air by removing pollutants and allergens.
Shoe-based personal cooling system: A shoe with a built-in fan or cooling gel can help keep the wearer's feet cool in hot weather.
